trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGZD003_05092_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The concerned villager anxiously awaits the return of her friend.
TEXT_KINGZD003_05092_TODO_00<tab>Find the novice fisher and slay any monsters that attack.
TEXT_KINGZD003_05092_XBRAALGIRL05092_000_000<tab>...Oh! Hello. You look like you can handle yourself... Please, if you can spare a moment, I desperately need your help!

TEXT_KINGZD003_05092_XBRAALGIRL05092_000_001<tab>You see, one of my friends said he was going fishing in a cenote, but hasn't come back for some time. While the right cenote can be quite bountiful, they naturally attract all sorts of hungry beasts. I'm worried something terrible has happened...

TEXT_KINGZD003_05092_XBRAALGIRL05092_000_002<tab>I don't know which one he went to, but I'll ask that you search Iq Rrax Tsoly, to the east of the dirigible landing. I have another one in mind for myself─hopefully he'll be at one of them!
TEXT_KINGZD003_05092_XBRAALFISHER05092_000_010<tab>I owe you my life! Although I guess some of that debt is owed to my friend for sending such a strong fighter...
TEXT_KINGZD003_05092_XBRAALFISHER05092_000_011<tab>Either way, we'd best leave before the scent of blood attracts even more creatures. Speak with me again at Iq Br'aax.
TEXT_KINGZD003_05092_XBRAALFISHER05092_000_015<tab>I owe you my life, and make no mistake.
TEXT_KINGZD003_05092_XBRAALGIRL05092_000_020<tab>Thank you for saving my friend! If you had arrived even a moment later, I shudder to think what would've happened...

TEXT_KINGZD003_05092_XBRAALFISHER05092_000_021<tab>I'm sorry I caused all this fuss. I was just fantasizing about all the fish I'd bring home...and forgot there's a reason they call that the crimson cenote.
TEXT_KINGZD003_05092_XBRAALFISHER05092_000_022<tab>I suppose you might not've heard the legends behind that name, eh, traveler? They're grim, and make no mistake...

TEXT_KINGZD003_05092_XBRAALFISHER05092_000_023<tab>It's said that during the war with the Mamool Ja, the cenote used to be a burial place for our fallen. There are also stories of desperate people diving in to avoid capture by the enemy. In both cases, the monstrous fish in Iq Rrax Tsoly feasted, and its waters would be stained red...

TEXT_KINGZD003_05092_XBRAALFISHER05092_000_024<tab>Sometimes it's easy to forget the lessons our stories teach us, but there's a reason they persist. I won't go fishing again without a proper escort─you have my word on that.
